description:
Room Features

With peaceful interior views and comfortably spacious accommodation featuring four-fixture bathrooms, these 700 square foot Executive One Bedroom Suites are situated on floors 4 to 6.

Bed & Bath Experience

The Executive Suites are designed in classic Manhattan residential style with high ceilings and are situated in the interior side of the hotel. The elegantly designed living room features a comfortable sofa and coffee table opposite the 40” wall mounted TV and console with minibar. There are two side chairs and a side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room.

The comfortable bedroom features a king sized bed, an armchair with side table on the far side of the room. The full bathroom, located in the bedroom features a glass-enclosed shower, soaking tub with oversized showerheads, plush bathrobes, towels and luxurious Etro bath amenities. Most Executive Suites feature a half bathroom near the entrance to the suite. Some feature a kitchenette instead.
short_description: With peaceful interior views and comfortably spacious accommodations featuring four-fixture bathrooms, these 700 square foot Executive One Bedroom Suites are situated on floors 4 to 6.
amenities:
Our service includes 24 hour white gloved elevator attendants, Complimentary hotel Jaguar service subject to availability, an Award-winning Les Clefs d'Or Concierge team to assist guests.

In-room comforts feature Complimentary high speed wi-fi for up to 5 devices, 24 hour in-room dining service, Housekeeping daily service twice, Overnight complimentary shoe shine, Plush terry cloth robes and Pierre slippers, Exclusive Etro toiletries, On site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services, Complimentary dog amenities (for pets up to 15 pounds), Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in. For a full list of our guest services and amenities click here.
name: Executive King One Bedroom Suite Interior View
